title: How to Get Free Pizza at Your Favorite Pizza Places

steps.title: Get an Emergency Pizza by signing up for Domino’s rewards program.
steps.content: Get an Emergency Pizza by signing up for Domino’s rewards program. Domino’s is now offering a free pizza for anyone making a qualifying online order with a Domino’s Rewards account. All you have to do is sign into your account, order a pizza, and wait for your free pizza code to be delivered. [1] X Research source Keep in mind that this offer requires a separate purchase. You earn a free Emergency Pizza to use later when you make a qualifying purchase. Customers can earn up to 2 Emergency Pizzas, which must be redeemed within 30 days.

steps.title: Sign up for Papa Rewards for exclusive deals and offers.
steps.content: Sign up for Papa Rewards for exclusive deals and offers. While Papa John’s doesn’t promise free pizza, there are plenty of ways to earn a free pie if you’re in their rewards program. The more pizza you buy, the more “Papa Dough” you earn. This “Dough” can then be turned into a free pizza or other menu item. [2] X Research source Papa John’s also has seasonal offers for holidays like Halloween, Valentine’s Day, and New Year's that sometimes feature free pie.

steps.title: Join Hut Rewards to earn free pizza.
steps.content: Join Hut Rewards to earn free pizza. Getting free pizza can be as easy as ordering pizza at Pizza Hut! Simply sign up for Hut Rewards (Pizza Hut’s rewards program) and sign into your account before ordering. You’ll earn 2 points for every $1 spent. [3] X Research source A free Medium 2-Topping Pizza costs 200 points, and a Large Any Pizza uses 300 points. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Get a buy-1-get-1 free pizza from CPK during National Pizza Month.
steps.content: Get a buy-1-get-1 free pizza from CPK during National Pizza Month. From October 3rd to October 31st, California Pizza Kitchen runs a promotion where you can get a free Take & Bake Pizza with any $25 purchase. All you have to do is dine in and buy at least $25 worth of food. [5] X Research source CPK also has a rewards program where every purchase earns points. Diamond and Elite rewards members get a free birthday entree (which can be a pizza). [6] X Research source

steps.title: Earn a free birthday pizza by putting your name on a list.
steps.content: Earn a free birthday pizza by putting your name on a list. Once a year, you can get a free 1 Topping Pizza at Marco’s Pizza. Sign up for their email list . Then, on your birthday, you’ll receive an email with a coupon for a free pie. [7] X Research source

steps.title: Sign up for Sbarro Rewards for a free birthday slice.
steps.content: Sign up for Sbarro Rewards for a free birthday slice. Like most pizza chain companies, Sbarro offers birthday deals for their loyal customers. All you have to do is sign up for their rewards program and download their app. Then, a week before your birthday, you’ll receive a promotional code or coupon for a free XL NY Slice with a minimum purchase of $5. [8] X Research source
